verbs.description: After [ARG0: months of saber - rattling] [R-ARG0: that] [V: gave] [ARG1: way] [ARG2: to flirtation] , President Trump finally met face - to - face with Kim Jong Un at a hotel on Sentosa Island in Singapore on Tuesday morning . The two men walked along a white colonnade , meeting in front of a bank of 12 alternating U.S. and North Korean flags where
